summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Community Development Block Grant Float Loan Program; authorizing a short-term loan of up to Two Million Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($2,075,000.00) in federal Block Grant funds to Rose & Associates, L.L.C. to refinance the costs of acquiring inventory, fixtures, equipment and the leasehold interest in the Promenade Red Apple Market, and to finance new leasehold improvements; authorizing related agreements and amendment of the Consolidated Plan; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
